## FunctionDeclarationsTool.functionDeclarations property

Optional. One or more function declarations to be passed to the model along with the current user query. Model may decide to call a subset of these functions by populating \[FunctionCall\]\[content.part.functionCall\] in the response. User should provide a \[FunctionResponse\]\[content.part.functionResponse\] for each function call in the next turn. Based on the function responses, Model will generate the final response back to the user. Maximum 64 function declarations can be provided.

**Signature:**

```typescript
functionDeclarations?: FunctionDeclaration[];
```
